message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.DS, cs.NE. 

The paper deals with the optimization of posterior distributions for stochastic classifiers, which is a common topic in machine learning and falls under the category of "Learning" (cs.LG). The use of these optimized posteriors for SVM regularization parameter selection also suggests a connection to "Artificial Intelligence" (cs.AI) and "Computer Vision" (cs.CV) sub-categories. The paper also involves the use of fixed point equations and optimization techniques, which are relevant to "Data Structures and Algorithms" (cs.DS) and "Neural and Evolutionary Computing" (cs.NE) sub-categories.
